DOC.detailed_description: For study , investigator plan evaluate DWI scan perform woman breast lesion identify conventional breast MRI . The investigator determine whether ADC threshold define distinguish benign malignant lesion DWI , ass difference ADC cutoff mass non-mass lesion , investigate potential improvement accuracy use technique nonzero minimum b-value ( remove perfusion effect ADC measure ) normalize ADC measure ( account variation water content factor ) .
DOC.criteria: Willing able provide write informed consent ; 18 year age older ; Successful completion breast MR examination DWI require protocol ; Undiagnosed breast lesion ( BIRADS 3 , 4 , 5 ) identify MRI . The BIRADS assessment must refer focal finding within breast ( i.e . mass , nonmass , focus ) oppose diffuse process ( e.g . background parenchymal enhancement , skin thicken ) lesion outside subcutaneous breast ( e.g . axillary lymph node , focal skin lesion , osseous lesion , etc. ) .
